name: Beryl DOBSON v. DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY, BOARD OF REVIEW
name_abbreviation: Dobson v. Department of Employment Security, Board of Review

parties: Beryl DOBSON v. DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY, BOARD OF REVIEW.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Michael J. Bashaw, Providence, for petitioner.
Pat Nero, Legal Counsel, Board of Review, Cranston, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Beryl DOBSON v. DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY, BOARD OF REVIEW.
No. 82-37-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 1, 1982.
Michael J. Bashaw, Providence, for petitioner.
Pat Nero, Legal Counsel, Board of Review, Cranston, for respondent.
